name: Pilfer: Story of Light
description:
The forest is falling to darkness, and it's up to Pilfer to restore the light. With the aid of his spirit companion Lumi, Pilfer can run, jump, and utilize special objects in the world to maneuver through tons of unique locales and levels.

Features

  • Over 30 levels, each with different mechanics
  • Unlockable costumes and challenge levels
  • Monsters, allies, and foes to meet along the journey with dialogue and cutscenes
  • A cute story wrapped in a storybook aesthetic

Darkness Falls

The forces of the mysterious owl Caligo have swarmed the forest, eager to stop Pilfer in his tracks. Defeat enemies and bosses along the journey to put a stop to Caligo's evil doings.

A Vibrant World

The Great Forest is home to many different animals and spirits. Explore different worlds with varied natives, from an overgrown jungle to a mechanical honey factory. Each level and world features it's own unique mechanics to challenge your platforming skills.

Collect

As you collect Star Pages and coins through your journey, you may spend them to unlock new costumes and challenge levels.
